notes.description: Azure Blob Storage configuration for downloading general folder
instructions: 1. Replace 'your-storage-account-name' with your actual storage account name
2. Replace 'your-sas-token-here' with your actual SAS token
3. Keep the '?' at the beginning of the SAS token if it's there
4. Make sure the SAS token has read and list permissions
5. Save this file and run: python download_general_folder.py
